A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The good: (1) Beautiful visuals and salt planet provided great scenery for the final fight. (2) Luke's gravitas matching that of Alec Guinness (3) Some good fight scenes. (4) Porgs and ice foxes are quite cool.

The bad: (1) Disconnect with episode 7. (2) Snoke is useless. (3) Kylo Ren is no longer menacing without mask.

The ugly: (1) Rey is impossible to get behind. She moves boulders despite no training and without so much as a grimace. Compare to Luke's struggle in episode 5. (2) The plot is frequently pointless and rambling. (3) Luke's legacy is destroyed. (4) In a contrived storyline involving a condescending Laura Dern\, Po Dameron is made to look hotheaded and ridiculous. (5) Bombs away...
